page.title: 01GAZETTEER OF HUDDERSFIELD
page.content: Huddersfield lies at the foot of the {Pennines.}The main industries are {textiles, engineering & chemicals although in recent years many factories have closed down especially in the field of{textiles.}A once prosperous town attracted many {immigrants}from the{West Indies}and the{Indian sub-continent.}Today the people of Huddersfield exist in a peaceful{multi-ethnic}community.With a population of approximately{124,000 {people.}The level of unemployment is not as high as in other towns and cities in the country, but the industrial depression is beginning to catch up as shown by the number of recent{shop & factory closures.}The cultural life is centred around the Town Hall and the largest educational establishment is the Polytechnic.
